Name: San Francisco (Café Royal)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Fruity, aromatic and complex. This is one of my favourite sloe gin cocktails, made all the more appealing by its bijou serve.
History: First published in William James "Billy" Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of San Francisco (Café Royal) contains 125 calories
